trait.name: Axiomatic Mind
entries: The septon can't be compelled to act in a manner contrary to its nature or its instructions.

trait.name: Combat Ready
entries: The septon has advantage on initiative checks.

trait.name: Disintegration
entries: If the septon dies, its body disintegrates into dust, leaving behind anything it was carrying.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The septon makes four Tentacle attacks and uses Lightning Network or Spellcasting.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) piercing damage, and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the {@condition grappled} condition (escape {@dc 14}). Until this grapple ends, the septon can't use this tentacle against other targets. The septon has seven tentacles, each of which can grapple one target.

action.name: Lightning Network
entries: The septon conjures a field of electricity that fills a 30-foot cube originating from itself before dissipating. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 33 ({@damage 6d10}) lightning damage and has the {@condition stunned} condition for 1 minute. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage only. A {@condition stunned} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

headerEntries: The septon casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 16}):
